org.libpag

Class PAGScaleMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libpag.PAGScaleMode

  • public class PAGScaleMode
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the values used in the setScaleMode method of PAGRenderer.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LetterBox
      The content is scaled with respect to the original unscaled image's aspect ratio.
      static int None
      The content is not scaled.
      static int Stretch
      The content is stretched to fit.
      static int Zoom
      The content is scaled to fit with respect to the original unscaled image's aspect ratio.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PAGScaleMode()

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • None

        public static final int None
        The content is not scaled.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • Stretch

        public static final int Stretch
        The content is stretched to fit.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LetterBox

        public static final int LetterBox
        The content is scaled with respect to the original unscaled image's aspect ratio. This is the default value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • Zoom

        public static final int Zoom
        The content is scaled to fit with respect to the original unscaled image's aspect ratio. This results in cropping on one axis.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
